languages.text: Авгуры засекли слабый тепловой след в центральном городе-улье планеты. Для уточнения данных требуется высадка на поверхность.

traits.locale_text: Авгуры засекли слабый тепловой след в центральном улье планеты. Для уточнения данных требуется высадка на поверхность.

languages.text: The augurs have detected a faint heat signature in the planet's central hive city. Homing in on the signal requires a team to go down to the surface.
languages.original_text: Авгуры засекли слабый тепловой след в центральном городе-улье планеты. Для уточнения данных требуется высадка на поверхность.

traits.locale_text: The augers have detected a faint heat signature in the planet's central hive city. Homing in on the signal requires a team to go down to the surface.
The augers have detected a faint heat signature in the planet's central hive city. Homing in on the signal requires a team to go down to the surface.
The augers have detected a faint heat signature in the planet's central hive city. Homing in on the signal requires a team to go down to the surface.
The augurs have detected a faint heat signature in the planet's central hive city. Homing in on the signal requires a team to go down to the surface.

languages.text: 俄歇矩阵在这颗行星的中央巢都处扫描到了微弱的热源信号。如果想得知这个信号的确切地址，就必须派遣一支探查小队，降落到行星表面。
languages.original_text: The augurs have detected a faint heat signature in the planet's central hive city. Homing in on the signal requires a team to go down to the surface.

traits.locale_text: 俄歇矩阵在这颗行星的中央巢都处扫描到了微弱的热源信号。如果想得知这个信号的确切地址，就必须派遣一支探查小队，降落到行星表面。

languages.text: スキャナーが惑星の中心部にある多層都市に、微かな熱の兆候を検出した。信号の誘導に従うには、チームを地表に降ろさなければならない。
languages.original_text: The augurs have detected a faint heat signature in the planet's central hive city. Homing in on the signal requires a team to go down to the surface.

traits.locale_text: スキャナーが惑星の中心部にある多層都市に、微かな熱の兆候を検出した。信号の誘導に従うには、チームを地表に降ろさなければならない。

languages.text: Los augures han detectado una débil señal de calor en la ciudad colmena central del planeta. Será necesario enviar un equipo a la superficie para investigarla.
languages.original_text: The augurs have detected a faint heat signature in the planet's central hive city. Homing in on the signal requires a team to go down to the surface.

traits.locale_text: Los augures han detectado una débil señal de calor en la ciudad colmena central del planeta. Será necesario enviar un equipo a la superficie para investigarla.

languages.text: Die Auguren empfangen eine schwache Herzfrequenz aus der zentralen Makropole des Planeten. Um das Signal zurückzuverfolgen, muss ein Team auf der Oberfläche abgesetzt werden.
languages.original_text: The augurs have detected a faint heat signature in the planet's central hive city. Homing in on the signal requires a team to go down to the surface.

traits.locale_text: Die Auguren empfangen eine schwache Herzfrequenz aus der zentralen Makropole des Planeten. Um das Signal zurückzuverfolgen, muss ein Team auf der Oberfläche abgesetzt werden.

languages.text: Les augures ont détecté une faible signature thermique dans la cité-ruche principale de la planète. Inspecter le signal nécessite d'envoyer une équipe à la surface.
languages.original_text: The augurs have detected a faint heat signature in the planet's central hive city. Homing in on the signal requires a team to go down to the surface.

traits.locale_text: Les augures ont détecté une faible signature thermique dans la cité-ruche principale de la planète. Inspecter le signal nécessite d'envoyer une équipe à la surface.

languages.text: Alametler, gezegenin merkez kovan kentinde hafif bir ısı izi tespit etti. Sinyale ulaşmak için yüzeye ekip inmesi gerekiyor.
languages.original_text: The augurs have detected a faint heat signature in the planet's central hive city. Homing in on the signal requires a team to go down to the surface.

traits.locale_text: Alametler, gezegenin merkez kovan şehrinde hafif bir ısı izi tespit etti. Sinyale ulaşmak için yüzeye bir ekibin inmesi gerekiyor.
